p1: Find out about Capture Note’s usage, shortcuts. If you still need help, don't hesitate to ask us.

shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.description: Capture Note comes with a very useful global and non-global keyboard shortcuts.

global.title: Global Shortcuts
global.description: Capture Note comes with a useful global keyboard shortcuts.

capture_screen.title: Capture Screen
capture_screen.description: You can take a screenshot of the entire screen using this global shorcut

capture_portion.title: Capture Selected Portion
capture_portion.description: You can take a screenshot of the selected portion using this global shorcut

open_image.title: Open Image
open_image.description: You can open image using this global shorcut

page.title: Page Shortcuts
page.description: Capture Note comes with a useful keyboard shortcuts for editing the page(Image and Notes)

save_page.title: Save Page
save_page.description: You can save page(Image and Notes) as single image file

copy_to_clipboard.title: Copy to Clipboard
copy_to_clipboard.description: You can copy page(Image and Notes) to the clipboard

create_note.title: Add Note
create_note.description: You can add a new note using this shortcut

create_note_from_paste.title: Add Note from Clipboard
create_note_from_paste.description: You can add a new note from clipboard using this shortcut

close_page.title: Close the page
close_page.description: You can clear the image and notes and close app

note.title: Note Shortcuts
note.description: Capture Note comes with a useful keyboard shortcuts for editing the notes

delete_note.title: Delete Note
delete_note.description: You can delete focused note with this shortcut

move_note.title: Move Note
move_note.description:
When there is no text, you can move notes.
It is possible only when there are no input characters

change_note_width.title: Increase / Decresase note width
change_note_width.description:
You can increase or decresase the note width with this shortcut
It is possible only when there are no input characters

escape_note.title: Escacpe Note
escape_note.description: You can finish editing a note with this shortcut

focus_to_next_note.title: Escacpe Note
focus_to_next_note.description: You can focus next note with this shortcut
